title: 1950 Boston University Terriers football team
text: The 1950 Boston University Terriers football team was an <a href="American%20football">American football</a> team that represented <a href="Boston%20University">Boston University</a> as an independent during the <a href="1950%20college%20football%20season">1950 college football season</a>. In its fourth season under head coach <a href="Aldo%20Donelli">Aldo Donelli</a>, the team compiled a 3–5 record and was outscored by their opponents by a total of 187 to 139.
